document.docAuthor: Tang, Ya-Ni, Wu, Ya-Ying, Zhao, Yu & Yang, Zi-Zhong
document.docTitle: Vacrothele hunanica Tang & Wu & Zhao & Yang 2022, comb. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Description of a new genus and two new species of the funnel-web mygalomorph (Araneae: Mygalomorphae: Macrothelidae) from China with notes on taxonomic amendments

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of a new genus and two new species of the funnel-web mygalomorph (Araneae: Mygalomorphae: Macrothelidae) from China with notes on taxonomic amendments
